name: Jump to Work
description:
An Endless runner, jumping with a physics very funny and challenging, only with one touch. when you jump in a wall and jump again you change the direction and then the character continue running in the new direction.

try to go higher more and more, and get some cash to buy skins for your worker

Notes: - the game was made a few time ago, some of new phones have bigger aspect ratio and the game don't fill the space.
- In the store, to go back we don`t implement a button, so you need to use a back button in your phone.
- to install the game on your phone, it may tell you that since it is not a trusted application it will not let you install it, you have to change the configuration to be able to do it, or use bluestack if you want

this game is in pause for now, very sorry ._.
